17 template<class T>
18 template<class Archive>
19 void shm_ref<T>::load(Archive &ar) {
20  ar & V_NAME(ar, "shm_name", m_name);
21  std::string name = m_name;
22 
23  unref();
24  m_p = nullptr;
25  ObjectData *obj = ar.currentObject();
26  if (obj && !valid()) {
27  //std::cerr << "obj " << obj->name << ": unresolved: " << name << std::endl;
28  obj->unresolvedReference();
29  }
30  auto handler = ar.objectCompletionHandler();
31  auto ref = ar.template getArray<typename T::value_type>(name, [this, name, obj, handler]() -> void {
32  //std::cerr << "array completion handler: " << name << std::endl;
33  auto ref = Shm::the().getArrayFromName<typename T::value_type>(name);
34  assert(ref);
35  *this = ref;
36  if (obj) {
37  //std::cerr << "obj " << obj->name << ": RESOLVED: " << name << std::endl;
38  obj->referenceResolved(handler);
39  } else {
40  //std::cerr << "shm_array RESOLVED: " << name << std::endl;
41  }
42  });
43  if (ref) {
44  *this = ref;
45  if (handler)
46  handler();
47 #if 0
48  } else {
49  //std::cerr << "waiting for completion of " << name << std::endl;
50  auto obj = ar.currentObject();
51  if (obj && !valid())
52  obj->unresolvedReference();
53 #endif
54  }
55 }
